name: Soldiers of Fortune (Ward Against Evil)
description:
“If violence wasn’t your last resort, you failed to resort to enough of it.”

~ Howard Tayler

Soldiers of Fortune is a ruleset that allows players of OnePageRules (a fantastic wargame not made by me) to control a Company of Mercenaries and take on procedurally generated Contracts to fight the powers at be.

Soldiers of Fortune are compatible with both Age of Fantasy: Skirmish and Grimdark Future: Firefight, allowing you to play in either setting without issue. 

The Core Rules include:
  • Rules for creating and maintaining a unique Mercenary Company, based in a faction from either OPR's Age of Fantasy or Grimdark Future, without being entirely tied to just that faction
  • A 5-step process for procedurally generating Contracts (missions you can go on to get paid)
  • A unique AI Decision-Making System that does not rely on decision trees and takes into account Player input without slowing down the game
  • Rules for Enemy Garrisons, Reinforcements, Command Squads, Specialists, and Wizards/Psychics
  • An improved Injury and Veterancy system that encourages the growth of elite mercenary bands
  • A sheet for tracking your Company's Attributes, Staff, and Roster of Mercs
  • A sheet for tracking your Income and Accounts after each successful contract
  • A sheet for tracking what Contracts you have available to you at any given moment
Each of the Setting Books includes:
  • Specific rules for Strange Terrain in each setting
  • Faction tables for each setting
  • Company Staff tables for each setting (think of them like followers in your Company that provide passive bonuses)
  • An entire sheet on each Faction, providing a unique Patron's Favor, Spells, Wizard/Psychic Actions table, Squads, and Specialists
What still needs to be done?
